description:
She returned to the judges' table this season to pass her wisdom on to hundreds of pop wannabes on American Idol.詹妮弗·洛佩兹在昨天《美国偶像》决战之夜回归，她再一次出现在成百上千的歌迷面前。

But on Wednesday's finale, Jennifer Lopez letting her performance do the talking, as she took to the stage for a powerhouse performance of her new single First Love. 周三美国偶像决战之夜，詹妮弗以一场精彩表演征服全场观众，当天她登台演唱了新单曲《First love》，整场表演活力四射，热舞不断。

Sporting a plunging purple fringed leotard with flesh flashing panels, the 44-year-old actress and singer shimmied her way through the number.44岁的资深演员兼歌手——詹妮弗·洛佩兹当天以一身蓝色流苏紧身连衣裤亮相，一边倒数，一边火辣热舞，尽情摇摆。

The new song appears on J-Lo's forthcoming A.K.A. album and her first performance after scooping the icon gong at last weekend's Billboard Awards. 这首歌收录在詹妮弗·洛佩兹即将发行的新专《A.K.A》里，而这也是她自上周末公告牌颁奖大典之后的首次表演。

'Such a fun night on #IdolFinale #JLoFirstLoveonIdol #moretocome #JudgesRockIdol,' Jennifer tweeted after the performance.“美国偶像决战之夜，很有趣！”詹妮弗在表演之后发推特说。
